channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Chemicals in sewage sludge fertilizer pose cancer risk, EPA says
item.description: Harmful chemicals in sewage sludge spread on pasture as fertilizer pose a risk to people who regularly consume milk, beef and other products from those farms, in some cases raising cancer risk “several orders of magnitude” above what the Environmental Protection Agency considers acceptable, federal

item.title: Dangerous winds could fuel blazes as Los Angeles beefs up firefighting force
Multiracial boom in 2020 census was mostly an illusion, researchers say
